layout.title: Categories
layout.message: Displays a list of items from one or more categories.

state.name: Categories
state.description: Displays a list of items from one or more categories.

param.name: categories
param.label: Select categories
param.description: If you select multiple categories, you can adjust additional parameters below. If you select only one category, then K2 will fetch the options as defined in that specific category's options (in K2 >> Categories).

param.name: catCatalogMode
param.label: Fetch items from children categories
param.description: If you select 'no' then only the items directly belonging to this category will be retrieved. If you select 'yes' then items from all sub-categories will be retrieved. Setting this option to 'yes' is ideal for news/portal/magazine/blog layouts.

param.default: Layout options for multiple category selection

param.name: num_leading_items
param.label: Leading count
param.description: Number of items to display as Leading.

param.name: leadingImgSize
param.label: Image size for leading items
param.description: The dimensions for each image size are defined inside K2's global parameters.

param.name: num_primary_items
param.label: Primary count
param.description: Number of items to display as Primary.

param.name: primaryImgSize
param.label: Image size for primary items
param.description: The dimensions for each image size are defined inside K2's global parameters.

param.name: num_secondary_items
param.label: Secondary count
param.description: Number of items to display as Secondary.

param.name: secondaryImgSize
param.label: Image size for secondary items
param.description: The dimensions for each image size are defined inside K2's global parameters.

param.name: num_links
param.label: Links count
param.description: Number of items to display as Links.

param.name: linksImgSize
param.label: Image size for link items
param.description: The dimensions for each image size are defined inside K2's global parameters.
